title: kb-update-pipeline
summary:
Automation proposes KB patches; humans verify; publishing is blocked until approvals are complete. 
 - **Type**: feature 
 - **Version**: 1.0.0 
 - **Stability**: experimental 
 - **Owners**: @examples
